basics.name: Shoaib Ahmed Khan
basics.label: Software Architect
basics.summary:
A software enthusiast. I have been working as a developer for around a decade. During 
this time, I have got a chance to visit various domains and technologies, which helped in
shaping myself on how I think and work now. I like to create software and helping other
developers like me around. Some recent technologies I have been working are PHP,
NodeJs, Docker, Java and other of such kind. My main focus is towards the problem
solving, irrespective of the platform

work.name: PureVPN
work.description: Contributed to PureVpn's overall product & technology strategy and aligning systems with that strategy.
work.summary: Gaditek is a human-centric New Age company. We innovate relentlessly and are always venturing into new markets with our employees.
highlights: Took the initiative, did POC and migrated Microservices behind AWS (API Gateway) which helped developers to create, publish, maintain, monitor, and secure APIs at any scale
Ensured that systems are fit for purpose, well architected and follow current PureVpn's development practices.
Maintained platform health, by ensuring that our systems are secure, reliable, resilient and cost effective.
Commenced technical mentorship and support for helping level-up the skills of colleagues on the team and their continual improvement.
Participated in planning and evaluation meetings to identify problems and propose business solutions.
Participated in Code Reviews, Documentation and maintained a good team culture
Facilitated product development and fulfillment to adopt `Scrum` Agile development
Fcilitated Devops Team to integrated CI/CD pipeline to automates software delivery process
Developed Notification Centre to help Product send notifications with Ease, Increasing profits and Customer Activation.

work.name: PureVPN
work.summary: Gaditek is a human-centric New Age company. We innovate relentlessly and are always venturing into new markets with our employees.
highlights: Participated in processes concerning the architecture to meet inter departmental needs.
Facilitate product development and fulfillment by adopting ‘Scrum’ Agile development methodology.
Implemented Micro service architecture between API’s to make the product ready for providing PaaS (Platform as a Service) services
Implemeted Google Cloud Firestore, to remove polling from our desktop applications which helped all the application receive notification via sockets in milliseconds.
Automate processes and problem resolution to enhance the productivity of existing systems.
Helped POC the product initially with our customers to set up our product owner for the success of the product.

work.name: PureVPN
work.summary: Gaditek is a human-centric New Age company. We innovate relentlessly and are always venturing into new markets with our employees.
highlights:
Responsible for the development and maintenance of the system's network services
. This includes returning the fastest servers, protecting the network from being abused.
Develop Rest APIs to facilitate VPN servers to handle the network activity efficiently.
Develop Microservice Architecture to assist PureVPN in providing PaaS services to its Business customers.
Implemented Database optimization Techniques to enhane performance of the Application

work.name: Goodcore Software
work.summary: Analyzed code and engineer well-researched, cost-effective and responsive solutions.
highlights: Review systems capabilities, workflow and limitations in order to design programs to improve performance.
Document work-time and processes as specified by management.
Mentored Junior resources, to level-up their skills.
Develop, Maintain and provide support for the comapnies on going projects.

work.name: Ephlux
work.summary: Helped the Company win Big by Research and Development.
highlights: Commenced development of modules on Java (AdobeCq5) which helped company win projects from the worlds biggest hotels chain (Caesars Palace)
Developed Numerous Rest Services using (Laravel,CakePHP and CodeIgniter), for applications from different domains including (Transportation,Social-Media,Food & Beverages etc.)
This is the place where I laid my hands on Adroid(Sdk) for the first time, developed a social media platform for IKEA(Saudia)
Worked on Different Content Management Systems including (Drupal,Wordpress,ExpressionEngine,Moodle and Joomla) & and delivered projects successfully, producing happy cleints

work.name: Tradekey (Pvt) Ltd.
work.summary: Learnt Software Development Practises and Implemented them for the good of the Product
highlights: Product development & Maintenance using ( MVC )in PHP.
Email marketing using MySQL queries on (Interspire).
Writing Complex queries to generate reports from a database of 6 Million users, used for running marketing campaigns
Implemented query optimization Techniques to increase performance of the queries performed on huge datasets.

publications.name: Configuring Micro-services Behind AWS API Gateway and Securing it with oAuth 2.0
publications.summary: This Article explains integration of Amazon Api Gateway with Microservices, secured by Amazon Cognito's oAuth 2.0.

references.name: Umair Khan
references.reference: Shoaib did not fail me a single time throughout our tenure of working together. He is a dedicated, ambitious and result driven leader. If you ever need someone to deliver under pressure, no slip-ups, just results, Shoaib is your man! He ss ready to deal with difficult situations and solve the problems on time. I wish him all the very best for his future endeavors.

references.name: Tariq Mehmood Khatri
references.reference: Shoaib is a problem solver no matter how complex the problem is. He foresees the use cases that many ignore. Brings energy into the team by his unique friendly attitude. He has the ability to work on any new technology. With all this, he’s an amazing human being. Cheers !

projects.name: PureVPN
projects.description: PureVPN is a VPN service provider that offers the most secure and fastest VPN service.
highlights: Responsible for Planning, Code Reviews, Documentation of the newly built features.
Responsible for technical mentorship and support for helping level-up the skills of colleagues on the team.
I am also Responsible for writing Rest Services under Microservice Architecture to assist PureVPN in providing PaaS services to its customers.
Facilitate product development and fulfillment by adopting ‘Scrum’ Agile development methodology.

projects.name: ATTRACTOR
projects.description:
ATTRACTOR is a system developed to automate the printing and delivery of the postal mail.
The system allows the user to generate customized priniting material online (post-cards,broushers,flyers etc) and schedule it for automated printing and delivery to the subscribers. 
The system also got capability of sending the printed material as email.
highlights:
I was responsible for the front and back end development of the system using 
 PHP/MySQL & AngularJS.

projects.name: Football Pulp
projects.description:
Football Pulp is an Android app that will keep you connected to the world of football and everything it has to offer. Whether you are looking for news, schedules, the latest gossips or updates, it can all be found within the app.

Football Pulps supports 6 major leagues namely ( English Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primera División & Champions League). Features include Live commentary, Live Streaming, Goal Notification, Match Start Notification, Half Time notifications, Full Time Notification , Match Highlights, Time conversion w.r.t GMT, Match Reminders and many more.
highlights: I was responsible for Architecting and Developing  RESTful API’s for the app which were responsible population UI of the application including live notifictions for Goal, Match Results, Match Breaks etc.

projects.name: SIRVA (Worldwide Relocation & Moving)
projects.description:
SIRVA is a Task Tracking & Monitoring System designed for Re-locations,of a leading Relocation Management Company in Germany. The system is designed to facilitate the Organizers to Capture and Monitor Task records related to tracking assignment data or process relocation expense reports.

Core system concepts are Data Capturing and Task Reminders based on Process Flows, Archive Checklist, Costs Projection and Vendor Management.

SIRVA is an ERP for Relocation build on PHP using Yii framework and MySQL as a back-end to manage complex operations around international relocation management services.
highlights: I was responsible for the development, maintenance and continious improvments in the system.

projects.name: IKEA Tawasul
projects.description: This application helps connect all IKEA Co-workers from across Saudi Arabia and builds a community of the IKEA Saudi Arabia family members who reside miles away from each other. The app allows Co-workers of IKEA Riyadh, IKEA Jeddah, IKEA Dhahran, 407 and any future IKEA stores to gather at one platform where they are able to connect with each other in a better way.
highlights: I was responsible for the development and customization of the android application using Android SDK

projects.name: Learning Management System (LMS)
projects.description:
Learning management system is developed for Karachi Medical And Dental College (KMDC) which is a leading Medical and Dental college of Pakistan.
The system developed allows KMDC to systematically manage the learning and development of their staff and students through one consolidated system.
highlights: I was responsible for developing the Admin Panel for managing all the functions performed by the LMS.

projects.name: Unstoppable Moms | Children's Motrin®
projects.description: It is a Johnson & Johnson brand Motrin which launches a promotional competition campaign for their consumers in the United States of America. In this regard we worked closely with AOL’s sales and advertising team to develop this Drupal based micro site with Parallax effects and Responsive designs.
highlights: I was responsible for implementing the design and functionality on Drupal 7.

projects.name: Cab2Grab
projects.description: London’s 1st minicab sharing app. Find taxis and passengers to share the fare with near you, with 100% secure and trusted profiles. Experience the comfort of private travel for the cost of public transport.
highlights: I was responsible for the development of RestFull Apis for the application using CakePHP.

projects.name: Washington Federal Bank
projects.description:
Washington Federal Bank for Savings launched their brand new website designed in Chicago and Developed and Launched by us.
The website has been developed using Drupal 7.xx and has been optimized to meet the security & scalability standards required for any financial institution.
highlights: I was responsible for development of the banks website.

projects.name: Caesars Palace
projects.description:
Caesars Palace is a world renowned Las Vegas Luxury Hotel.
The project involved Ephlux team working on numerous mobile and desktop websites of Caesars Palace properties. All of the websites were built on Adobe CQ5 meeting the security & scalability standards set by Caesars Palace.
highlights: Our team was responsible for development of custom components and templates in Adobe CQ5.
